name: The Grand Canyon VR Experience
description: Explore one of nature's greatest wonders from the comfort of your home with the Grand Canyon VR Experience for HTC VIVE and Oculus Rift! Transport yourself on an epic journey into the heart of nature through the magic of Virtual Reality completely immersed in a fully dynamic and interactive beauty never before seen in VR.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core i5 (or equivalent) Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 GPU (or equivalent) Storage: 2000 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires an HTC VIVE /Oculus Rift + touch controllers
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core i5 (or equivalent) Graphics: GeForce GTX 980 GPU (or equivalent) Storage: 2000 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires an HTC VIVE /Oculus Rift + touch controllers
